definition: A term commonly employed to describe the progression or course of an illness, providing insights into the development, duration, and various stages of a medical condition. It is frequently used in medical contexts to discuss the trajectory of diseases, including their symptoms, severity, and potential outcomes.

examples.english: The course of the illness was severe.
The course of the illness can vary.

examples.german: Ein langer Krankheitsverlauf kann zu Komplikationen führen.
examples.english: A long course of the illness can lead to complications.

examples.german: Der Krankheitsverlauf wurde durch Medikamente verbessert.
examples.english: The course of the illness was improved by medication.

examples.german: Der genaue Krankheitsverlauf ist noch unklar.
examples.english: The exact course of the illness is still unclear.
